mapper.sql: APPLY_AGENT_ID applyAgentId, AGENT_CODE agentCode, PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, APPLY_USER_ID applyUserId, AGENT_STAGE_STATE agentStageState, AGENT_APPLY_STATE agentApplyState, WINDOW_ID windowId, AGENT_USER_ID agentUserId, AGENT_USER_NAME agentUserName, AGENT_USER_MOBILE agentUserMobile, START_TIME startTime, END_TIME endTime, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId

${alias}.APPLY_AGENT_ID applyAgentId, ${alias}.AGENT_CODE agentCode, ${alias}.PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, ${alias}.UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, ${alias}.APPLY_USER_ID applyUserId, ${alias}.AGENT_STAGE_STATE agentStageState, ${alias}.AGENT_APPLY_STATE agentApplyState, ${alias}.WINDOW_ID windowId, ${alias}.AGENT_USER_ID agentUserId, ${alias}.AGENT_USER_NAME agentUserName, ${alias}.AGENT_USER_MOBILE agentUserMobile, ${alias}.START_TIME startTime, ${alias}.END_TIME endTime, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.update:
update AEA_PROJ_APPLY_AGENT
APPLY_AGENT_ID = #{applyAgentId},
AGENT_CODE = #{agentCode},
PROJ_INFO_ID = #{projInfoId},
UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId},
APPLY_USER_ID = #{applyUserId},
AGENT_STAGE_STATE = #{agentStageState},
AGENT_APPLY_STATE = #{agentApplyState},
WINDOW_ID = #{windowId},
AGENT_USER_ID = #{agentUserId},
AGENT_USER_NAME = #{agentUserName},
AGENT_USER_MOBILE = #{agentUserMobile},
START_TIME = #{startTime},
END_TIME = #{endTime},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where APPLY_AGENT_ID = #{applyAgentId}
